name: TheRealPositiveDailyMotivation
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Do you want to have an amazing day? This morning and every morning I will give you a "real positive motivational" message to help you make the most of every morning. I will give you the most authentic piece of content to help you be the best you can be to get the most out of this amazing thing we call life. 

It's short, concise, and authentically real!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
